input.sentences: this city is beautiful after the snow .
look at the ice on the river . what a great picture .
here is another view . the sky is crystal clear today .
the sun reflecting on the houses . colors are so stark .
walked over to the park . these monuments are looking great today .
output.sentences: The city is so beautiful every time it snows.
When the river gets covered with ice, it looks more like a picture than real life.
The sky is crystal clear and the view across the city is wonderful.
Because everything is white, the sun starkly reflects off of all surfaces.
I walked around the park and looked at all the monuments.
